about_the_game:
Enhance your journey through 'A Twisted Path To Renown' with the Founder Edition, including the Original game and the Founder Pack.



The Founder Pack includes:
  • A complete list of features of 'A Twisted Path To Renown' - Premium Edition
  • Additional Standard Vault Extension (9 x 7 cells)
  • A 'Founder Edition' starter items list:
    - 1x Vault 1899 FPM Safe (2x2 size, accommodates 12 items of almost any category)
    - $40.00 (in-game currency)
    - 4x Echinacea Salve (2 1/2oz)
    - 3x Splint
    - 2x Canned Deer Heart with Potato (Quickness booster)
    - 2x Canned Bass with Carrot (Sprinting Speed booster)
    - 1x Expedition Packhorse (5x6 capacity)
    - 1x Military Sidebag (3x3 capacity)
    - 2x Patroller Reserve Strap (3 ammo slots)
    - 2x Lightweight Dual Sidearm Holster
    - 2x Lightweight Dual Rifle Holster
    - 1x Small Storage Bin (2x2 size, accommodates 12 items from "Wood" and "Ore" categories)
    - 6x 350 Coal
    - 1x 2495 Lead Ingot
    - 1x 1892 Brass Ingot
    - 1x 1730 Iron Ingot
    - 3x 1600 Oak Log
  • A 'Founder' status in the game
  • A 'Founder' role in the Official Game Discord server, giving direct access to the dev team
  • A 'Homestead Expansion' Founders bonus pack (available mid/late 2024)

name: A Twisted Path To Renown - Founder Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: Try to survive the wilds of 1899 America. Join intense raids, craft vital items, and make deals with others. Build and expand your Homestead - a cradle of your farming, mining, prospecting and uniting your lands into businesses and production. Forge your legacy and build your path to renown.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
